short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extenstion is the todo app in which you can create/edit/remove todos which will be stored in the local storage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
create todo
edit todo 
remove todo
filter todo based upon active/completed
stored in localstorage
delete completed todos
count of active todos
